about_the_game:
Ruiga Pirates: Cursed Seas is a survival-themed adventure. Immerse yourself in hellish seas where pirates abound and sea creatures lurk at every turn. Engage in relentless battles, seizing all you can and leaving nothing behind. Collect gold on each journey to unlock upgrades, acquire new ships, and recruit skilled captains. Prepare yourself for the challenges of the seven seas!



In the prologue of our game, players are plunged into a realm of high-seas piracy, where the ominous presence of ghosts casts a foreboding shadow. Amidst relentless struggles for survival, they must skillfully navigate perilous waters, confronting both earthly and otherworldly dangers. With heart-pounding action and gripping encounters, the prologue lays the foundation for an epic journey brimming with excitement and danger.



Select your vessel and captain wisely in Ruiga Pirates: Cursed Seas. Tailor your enhancements to suit your style. Your decisions will determine your survival and combat prowess. Keep enemy ships at bay, evade fires, and beware of traps. Conquer challenges and uncover hidden treasures as you chart your course through perilous waters.



Embark on various missions in Ruiga Pirates: Cursed Seas, from bombing islands to pursuing notorious pirates. Brace yourself for encounters with legendary creatures such as krakens, mermaids, and beyond. Get ready to delve into the depths of myth and mystery on the high seas!
